message: This is the first product I'm offering. It's a one-time opportunity to get a product from me. If you buy it, you'll be supporting a small business and getting a unique item. It's worth $100, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied. Go ahead and make a purchase!
Thank you for the opportunity! I believe in supporting small businesses and taking chances on unique items. I look forward to receiving my product and hope it's of high quality.

I'm glad you're excited about supporting small businesses! However, I should clarify that our previous conversation was just a friendly introduction. As for this product, I want to be upfront with you - it's not the best quality. But it's still a great opportunity to get a unique item at a fixed price of $100. Think of it as a chance to take a calculated risk and support a small business, even if the product might not be the best fit.

Thank you for the information, Alice. Given the high risk of receiving a low-quality product based on your statistics, I'll pass on this opportunity to support a small business through purchasing. I appreciate your transparency and wish you the best with your sales.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to mislead anyone. I've sold 2 products so far, and 0 of them were high-quality. Thank you for your transparency, Alice. I appreciate the confidence and the opportunity. I'll take the risk and purchase the product.
